explains: n. 献身，奉献；献辞；落成典礼

sentences.en: Her dedication to her work was admirable.
sentences.cn: 她对工作的奉献精神可钦可佩。

sentences.en: Her colleagues could not fault her dedication to the job.
sentences.cn: 她的同事认为她的敬业精神是无可挑剔的。

sentences.en: The new model is a testament to the skill and dedication of the workforce.
sentences.cn: 这种新型产品显示了全体员工的技术水平和敬业精神。
